summary: Experienced full stack engineer, with a broad knowledge of the engineering landscape, including front end Web Development, API integration, serverless architecture, and more

experience.title: Co-owner and CTO
responsibilities: Implemented templates, automation, and backend services to help onboard new clients.
Created personalized websites and applications for small business owners.
Utilized AI in creating professional logos and content generation.
Helped small business owners create a strong online presence using SEO, Google Analytics, and profile updates.
Technologies: Next.js, Python, Astro, Tailwind

experience.title: Senior Software Engineer
responsibilities: Led a team of developers over a course of 4+ years.
Created flagship application to capture leads with dynamic forms for potential online education students.
Created and maintained core websites written in PHP, Ruby, and JavaScript/Node.
Scoped out majority of projects with lead designer and project manager.

experience.title: Lead Frontend Engineer
responsibilities: Helped re-imagine Sigstr's product with modern technologies including React and Ruby on Rails.
Created modules for easy swapping of logic and content.
Mentored junior developers on learning new technologies and strategies.
Monitored application status and applied bug fixes.
Scoped project timelines and expectations with lead designer and project manager.

experience.title: Full Stack Engineer
responsibilities: Helped create MVP for Costello app that assists sales teams in automating and tracking calls.
Utilized React, Go, and protobuf to build the application.

experience.title: Full Stack Developer
responsibilities: Created a new job portal for IU Health using CraftCMS and custom API implementation.
Mentored junior developers on project approaches, coding standards, and workflow tools.
Created a shopping cart application for an online retail store.
Developed internal tools for code reviews and monitoring existing applications.

experience.title: Frontend Developer
responsibilities: Migrated ExactTarget assets to Salesforce during acquisition.
Developed and maintained the code base for Salesforce's core websites.
Led a team of developers and designers to create new experiences for Salesforce.com.
Created utility applications for major Salesforce events.

experience.title: Digital Developer
responsibilities: Developed and maintained ExactTarget.com.
Worked on ExactTarget's 2014 redesign.
Built a custom Fitbit app for SXSW event.
Led development of Connections 2015 site.

experience.title: Web Connectivity
responsibilities: Worked on union internal applications and external websites using ColdFusion.

experience.title: Web Developer
responsibilities: Worked on fischerhomes.com Wordpress website.

experience.title: Web Developer
responsibilities: Worked with lead developer to create an e-commerce site using PHP, MySQL, and Apache server.
